1. These Regulations may be cited as the Vehicle Registration and

title: of 1992) are amended in Regulation 11 by the substitution of the following

title: of 1992) are amended in Regulation 11 by the substitution of the following
heading: 3. The Vehicle Registration and Taxation Regulations 1992 (S.I. No. 318
text_raw:
3. The Vehicle Registration and Taxation Regulations 1992 (S.I. No. 318 
of 1992) are amended in Regulation 11 by the substitution of the following 
paragraph for paragraph (4)(a): 

“(a) 

the person disposing of the vehicle shall insert 
particulars of the change of ownership on the reverse 
side of Part I of the certificate, detach that Part from 
the certificate and send or give it to the National 
VRT Service of the Commissioners at Anne Street, 
Wexford, Y35 E29K, or”. 

GIVEN under my hand, 
 7 November 2022 

NIALL CODY, 

 Revenue Commissioner. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 11th November, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [557] 3

title: of 1992) are amended in Regulation 11 by the substitution of the following
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations amend the Vehicle Registration and Taxation Regulations, 
1992 (S.I. No. 318 of 1992), by amending Regulation 11 to reflect the name 
change of the Central Vehicle Office to the National VRT Service. The 
reference in Regulation 11 of the 1992 Regulations to the Central Vehicle 
Office is now removed and is replaced by a reference to the National VRT 
Service. The reference to Rosslare Harbour in the county of Wexford is now 
removed and is replaced by a reference to Anne Street, Wexford, Y35 E29K.
